content.d: Ahh, we finally came to see the hydrangeas, but it started raining~
Yeah. But hydrangeas in the rain are really beautiful too.
W-wait, did I say something weird?
Nope! You just look so beautiful when you look at the hydrangeas in the rain that I couldn’t help but stare!
Wha-What!? H-Honoka-chan, what are you saying~!?
Geez... Well then, I’m going to say something too! When I’m next to you, I feel like I’ll forget it’s even raining. You’re so bright and lively. It’s like the sun is shining!
Whaat!? That’s really nice of you to say, but you can’t forget about the rain! You’re gonna get soaked! Look, hold onto your umbrella properly!
